statements: SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT phone_number, customer_name FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name, customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id < 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name FROM crm_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM crm_data ORDER BY phone_number ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, MAX(customer_id) AS largest_id FROM crm_data
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY o.quantity DESC, c.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT contact_id, email FROM Contacts ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, platform FROM interactions WHERE action = 'Click';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, payment_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp, platform, action FROM interactions WHERE platform = 'Web' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
